General.Name: Panca Global Securities Tbk
General.Description: PT Panca Global Kapital Tbk engages in the brokerage and underwriting services in Indonesia. It is also involved in the development and investment business; and residential building construction, as well as trades in various goods. The company was formerly known as PT Panca Global Securities Tbk and changed its name to PT Panca Global Kapital Tbk in March 2018. PT Panca Global Kapital Tbk was founded in 1999 and is headquartered in Jakarta, Indonesia.
General.Address: Indonesia Stock Exchange Tower I, Jakarta, Indonesia, 12190
